Translations.Text: Win Itlef Oebbi, ur isai bab, deffir eS. A pwaliv imednas, mara eoen aaaqeb, ad inin: "ma illa ubrid n tu$alin

A ten twaliv pwafessren fellas, ndellen, ggaren tii s tugwdi. Ad inin wid iumnen: "imexsuoen, s tidep, d wid i sxesoen iman nnsen, akked twacult nnsen, ass n tnekra". War ccekk, deg uaaqeb imezgi, ara yilin imednas
Ur asen llin imawlan, ara ten isellken, war Oebbi. Win Itlef Oebbi, ur isai abrid
Jawbet i Mass nnwen, uqbel a d ias, s$uo Oebbi, ass ur nepwexxio. Ur awen ippili ssoan assen, ur tezmirem a pnekoem
Ma numren, ur k id Nuzen ara d ameareb nnsen. Ay fellak, siwa timenna. Ih, mara Neseess i umdan aeunu s$uone£, ad ifoee yis. Mara t tsami tucmip, id bbwin ifassen is, s tidep, amdan ad ikaraa
N Oebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Ippak nnta i win i S ihwan, Ippak ddkeo i win i S ihwan
Ne$ Ipcarak ddkeo d nnta. Isaaqao win i S ihwan. Ih, Neppa Issen, Izmer
Ur ippunefk ara i umdan, ad as Immeslay Oebbi, siwa aweeei, ne$ deffir ucembir, ne$ a d iazen amazan iwumi ara Iweeei, s tsrie iS, ayen Ib$a. Ih, Neppa d Aalayen, d Bab n uuwab
Akka ik d Nweeea ooue, si lameo nne£; ur telliv d win issnen d acu p Tezmamt, ne$ liman. Maca, nerra p d tafat. Yis Nenehhu win i £ ihwan, seg imdanen nne£. Ih, d Kecc i ippawin d ubrid uwqim
abrid n Oebbi, i Isaan i illan di tmurt, i illan deg igenwan. War ccekk, ar Oebbi ay teddun lumuo
